name: Bay Rubber Company MEDIUM CLOSED CELL SILICONE SPONGE 1/2" THICK
description: Bay Rubber Company MEDIUM CLOSED CELL SILICONE SPONGE 1/2" THICK is an outstanding combination of silicone rubbers overall properties and closed cell sponge€™s utility. The silicone elastomer is expanded creating the closed cell structure prior to a heat cure process. Once at Bay Rubber Company silicone sponge is available in rolls, by the foot, slit or cut using any number of fabricating capabilities. Pressure sensitive adhesive is available for most silicone sponge products. Silicone sponge provides solutions for nearly every industry in large part due to its range of physical properties.
